PYM: Institute for Security Studies -Promoting the rule of Law democracy and Human Right through civil society action in South Africa

description.narrative: In 2012 MFA signed a grant agreement with ISS to contribute to ISS comprehensive funding proposal for them to implement their 2012-2015 strategy. This proposal seeks to contribute towards improving good governance achieving stability peace and prosperity i n Africa. The project is to provide a tailored support to the AU Africa governance platform to operationalize the implementation of its Africa Governance Architecture (AGA) in Africa. a MOU has been signed by both parties and ISS has also identified risks and mitigation strategies which can be associated with the implementation of this project . Beneficiaries will be Africa SCO and the unit AU unit staff

To strengthen civil society's knowledge and capacity to promote stability security peace and justice through active engagement with government in South Africa. ISS seeks to countinue empowering South African civil society to promote human rights good and a ccountable governance and democracy .This will be achieved through providing relevant information and analysis on key governance challenges that are related to corruption and the ability of state to uphold the rule of law.
